page.title: 05Malcroft Turkeys; Stanfree.
page.content: {'Malcroft Turkeys Limited'}is a farm. We keep turkeys on our farm,and have about{five thousand}in all. We have little day old turkeys which are nice and fluffy,and the fluff is yellow. When they grow big we get them one by one and take them down to the{killing} {shed. s} We put them in big cones {s s } get the knife and push { s s} it through the turkey's {s s } throat. When all the { l ___ l } blood has dripped out {l l l l } of the turkey's body {l l l l } we hang it up. When {l l l l } the body is just about cold we start plucking the feathers. If customers want them oven ready we dress them out and sell them. By CARRIE MATHER.
